effect.sun_moon: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon. This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon. This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon. This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.
